item.description: I wanted to let you know about this fun event at the Beehive on March 7. I am not sure if I can make it but looks like a great night of French Canadian Food and Music! True Northern Exposure: The Beehive in Boston, MA Becomes a "Sugar Shack" on Wednesday, March 7th, 2012 from 5:00PM – 2:00AM The Beehive Located in Boston, MA Becomes a Quebec “Sugar Shack” (cabane à sucre) on Wednesday, March 7th, 2012 from 5:00PM – 2:00AM Welcoming Chef Alexandre Loiseau and Musicians Isabelle Cyr & Yves Marchand and the Musical Group De Temps Antan! For more information please check out http://www.prweb.com/...

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: True Northern Exposure: Sugar Shack
